userActivation

A request to activate a new user account via email.

Attribute Comment Format Attributes
uid  The unique key.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
email  The email to be activated.  email
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		required
 
token  A long unique code that allows access without a password.  uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		required
 
createdUtcTs  When the object was created.  timestamp required
 
expirationUtcTs  The time when this token expires.  timestamp required
 
lockVersion  Used for optimistic locking.  lockVersion
